sentence.Network_en: She is as sprightly as a woman half her age .
sentence.Network_cn: 她跟比她年轻一半的妇女一样活泼。

sentence.Network_en: Then he was so sprightly, so clean.
sentence.Network_cn: 那时候,他是那么生气勃勃 、 衣冠整洁.

Is your once sprightly PC now grinding slowly along ?, 是您的电脑一旦明快现在磨削缓慢沿?
老爸一如过往精神奕奕（sprightly），行动敏捷（agile）。虽已七十有三，但去年体检时，报告说他的体能仍犹如一个四十岁的壮年人。
a sprightly young girl ; a sprightly dance ., 轻松活泼的年轻女孩 ; 轻快的舞曲.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from spright (rare variant of sprite) + -ly

entry.tran: (尤指老人)生气勃勃的，充满活力的，精力充沛的
entry.def: A sprightly person, especially an old person, is lively and active.

example.tran: 精神矍铄的 85 岁的总统
